content.value: public OptionDescriptorAttribute(string id, string dataType, string description, OptionFlags flags, string? alias = null)
Public Sub New(id As String, dataType As String, description As String, flags As OptionFlags, [alias] As String = Nothing)

children.remarks: The option alias is unique within a command. Option alias supports the legacy apps that identified a command option with an id and an alias string. For modern console apps, we recommend using just an option identifier. The core data model is optimized to work with option id. In general, an app should not identify the same option with multiple strings.

Public ReadOnly Property Description As String

children.remarks: The option id is unique across all commands.

children.remarks: The option id is unique within a command.
